summary: HQ & Recolor of the Husky Dawnguard Companion
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i641.photobucket.com/albums/uu140/edg3k/HuskyBanner.jpg[/IMG][/center]

I love huskies. One of my favorite dog breeds. I love the Dawnguard companion Husky but I found them a little, derpy looking. Cute but not as epic as they could be.

Now I\'m far from a pro retexturer but I try my best.
Ive deepened the color of the armor and increased ridge detail.
Ive also replaced the tongue on the husky with a more realistic (actually a real tongue) texture and lightened the fur while adding more quality to it.

Its far from perfect, but this time yesterday I had no idea what I was doing and now I\'m pulling detail from a 512x512 res texture, so, gimme a week :)

Enjoy and endorse if you like.

[center]---Requires Dawnguard---[/center]
author: Edg3
